en_clean: Oh, you know how to give hugs, now!
jp_raw: \m[vb]わ、フランもようやくハグの仕方が分かったんだな！
jp_clean: わ、フランもようやくハグの仕方が分かったんだな！

en_raw: You had a teacher for hugs? That's weird.
en_clean: You had a teacher for hugs? That's weird.
jp_raw: \m[vb]ハグの先生が？\!\ ヘンなの。
jp_clean: ハグの先生が？ ヘンなの。

en_raw: But, um, I know, stupid. I can see it.
en_clean: But, um, I know, stupid. I can see it.
jp_raw: だけど、言わなくても分かるよ、バカだな。\!見れば分かるじゃん。
jp_clean: だけど、言わなくても分かるよ、バカだな。見れば分かるじゃん。

en_raw: (Why would you tell a kid this!!!) "S-Sorry, it's just..."
en_clean: (Why would you tell a kid this!!!) "S-Sorry, it's just..."

en_raw: "You... Because of us, every loop, you'd get really worried that we'd die."
en_clean: "You... Because of us, every loop, you'd get really worried that we'd die."

en_raw: "So... Even if you don't remember, I just wanted to tell you that we're all okay."
en_clean: "So... Even if you don't remember, I just wanted to tell you that we're all okay."

en_raw: "Sorry, that was stupid. You don't even remember.
en_clean: "Sorry, that was stupid. You don't even remember.

en_raw: No, I get it! You HAD to tell me!
en_clean: No, I get it! You HAD to tell me!
jp_raw: \m[vb]ううん、分かるぞ！\!\ 言わなきゃなんない気持ち！
jp_clean: ううん、分かるぞ！ 言わなきゃなんない気持ち！

en_raw: It's like when I dreamt that my sister stole my breakfast and when I woke up I wouldn't talk to her until she apologized.
en_clean: It's like when I dreamt that my sister stole my breakfast and when I woke up I wouldn't talk to her until she apologized.
jp_raw: 夢の中で姉ちゃんに朝ごはんを横取りされたとき、オイラは姉ちゃんが謝ってくれるまで口をきかなかったんだ。
jp_clean: 夢の中で姉ちゃんに朝ごはんを横取りされたとき、オイラは姉ちゃんが謝ってくれるまで口をきかなかったんだ。

en_raw: Past Bonnie was scared about everyone dying and I don't remember but you do...
en_clean: Past Bonnie was scared about everyone dying and I don't remember but you do...
jp_raw: 過去のボニーはみんなが死ぬのを怖がってた。\!オイラはそれを覚えてないけど、フランは覚えてる...
jp_clean: 過去のボニーはみんなが死ぬのを怖がってた。オイラはそれを覚えてないけど、フランは覚えてる...

en_raw: ...And it makes you happy everyone is okay and you wanted to tell past Bonnie about it, and I'm here so you can tell me!!!
en_clean: ...And it makes you happy everyone is okay and you wanted to tell past Bonnie about it, and I'm here so you can tell me!!!
jp_raw: ...みんなが無事でフランはうれしくて、それを過去のボニーに伝えたいんだよな。\!そしてオイラがここにいる。\!だから、オイラに言えばいい！！！
jp_clean: ...みんなが無事でフランはうれしくて、それを過去のボニーに伝えたいんだよな。そしてオイラがここにいる。だから、オイラに言えばいい！！！

en_raw: I'm glad everyone is okay, too!
en_clean: I'm glad everyone is okay, too!
jp_raw: オイラもみんなが無事でうれしい！
jp_clean: オイラもみんなが無事でうれしい！

jp_raw: \m[clear](ボニーがにっこりと笑った。)
jp_clean: (ボニーがにっこりと笑った。)

en_raw: (You smile, and breathe out slowly, trying not to cry.)
en_clean: (You smile, and breathe out slowly, trying not to cry.)
jp_raw: (僕もほほ笑み、息をゆっくりと吐く。\!泣きださないように。)
jp_clean: (僕もほほ笑み、息をゆっくりと吐く。泣きださないように。)

jp_raw: ヘヘッ...\!\ こんにちは、フラン！
jp_clean: ヘヘッ... こんにちは、フラン！
